channel.title: [HELP] Tutor/Developer
channel.description:
Dear Moparscape;
I'm currently working on an RSPS bot loader, but I get stuck at the NPC instance for example. I could use some help :)
The bot is 100% reflection and I'm thinking about make it aswel as a bot as a cheat client. I've hooked already several things ( a few hooks in the classes are broken because the NPC instance) :
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2exvin7.png[/img]
Requirements: - You have skype and TeamViewer. - You have a lot of experience. - (optional) you've done something like this before ( could be usefull ).
Media: [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/23k8186.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2gv7s5c.png[/img]
